titleInfo.title: Coll 29/97 'Tabriz: elevation of Consulate to Consulate-General'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 19; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the status of the HM Consulate at Tabriz, raised to Consulate-General for the duration of the Second World War.The file is composed solely of internal correspondence between the Foreign Office, the India Office, the Treasury, and the Government of India.
